word_group.brief_definition: 偏远村庄；边远村庄；偏远村落
村落妇女；乡村妇女；农村妇女
村广场；村庄广场；乡村广场
村长辈；村长老；村里长者
海滨村；海滨村庄；海边的村庄

bilingual.target: 我们参观了一个小村庄。

bilingual.source: I was born in a small village.

list.abstract: village（英[ˈvɪlɪdʒ]，美[ˈvɪlɪdʒ]），英语单词，词性是名词，释义为村庄；村；生活小区等。例句：She helped the village to become famous.（她帮助村子变得出名。） village的复数是villages。短语搭配有small village（小村庄）、mountain village（山村）、village school（乡村学校）等。近义词有community、thorpe。

yingyinNormal.en: Until we came to a secret village, high in the mountains. An ancient place of healing. A village of pandas.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最后我们来到一个高山上的神秘村庄，古老的疗伤圣地，全村都是熊猫。

yingyinNormal.en: You have to come home with me. What? To the secret village? Yes, son.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你要跟我回家。什么？回到神秘村庄？对，儿子。

yingyinNormal.en: This is a small village, you know. Small minded, as well. But, small also means safe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你知道的，这个小村庄。思想很保守。但保守并不代表安稳。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the floating village of Sanduao. Here they've created hundreds of fish farms floating in the salt water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是三都澳的漂浮村庄。在这里，他们已创造了上百个漂浮在海水中的渔场。

yingyinNormal.en: Come on, you enjoyed the movie. I saw you tearing up when the village got flooded, and everyone had to relocate.
yingyinNormal.zh: 拜托，你明明很喜欢那电影。村庄要被淹没，所有人要搬家时，我看你都哭了。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the village café. My uncle makes very good pizza. You eat pizza in Italy? Pizza is Italian food.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是村庄的小餐厅。我叔叔会做很好吃的披萨。你在意大利吃披萨？披萨是意大利的食物。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like to do some sightseeing. The village is very pretty. I'll show you. OK. I'll just change out of these wet clothes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想去观光。这个小村庄很美，我告诉你怎么走。好的，我要把这个试衣服换下来。

yingyinNormal.en: We'd like to do some sightseeing. The village is very pretty. I'll show you. OK. I'll just change out of these wet clothes.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们想去观光。这个小村庄很美，我告诉你怎么走。好的，我要把这个试衣服换下来。

yingyinNormal.en: Down on Lantau's western coast, lose yourself in the narrow lane ways of Tai O. This village has been home to fishing families for generations.
yingyinNormal.zh: 向下走到大屿山西岸，便可沿着狭窄的小径走入大澳。这个村庄是渔民世世代代的家。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the village café. My uncle makes very good pizza. You eat pizza in Italy? Pizza is Italian food. Oh, goody. I like pizza.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是村庄的小餐厅。我叔叔会做很好吃的披萨。你在意大利吃披萨？披萨是意大利的食物。哦，好耶，我喜欢披萨。

yingyinNormal.en: It happened so fast. It was snowing. The bombs. The flames. There were flames all over the village. Then the screaming began, and got worse and worse.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一切发生得太快。又下着雪，到处是炸弹，还有火，整个村庄成了一片火海。然后到处是尖叫声，情况越来越糟。

yingyinNormal.en: Over generations, they have built a self-sustaining village fashioned entirely out of bamboo and wood with its own post office, police station, convenient store, restaurants and medical center.
yingyinNormal.zh: 几世几代，他们建成了一座自给自足的村庄，全部由竹子和木材构建而成。有着自己的邮局、警察局、便利商店、饭店和医疗中心。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Gabriella's village. Here is the shop of my untie. Can I send a postcard? Who is it for? A gold fish. A gold fish? Maybe a postcard of the sea. Yes, Goodie the fish likes water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是加布里埃拉的村庄。这是商店。我能寄一张明信片吗？要寄给谁？一只金鱼。一只金鱼？这个海洋的明信片怎么样？好的，金鱼金金喜欢水。

yingyinNormal.en: This is Gabriella's village. Here is the shop of my auntie. Can I send a postcard? Who is it for? A gold fish. A gold fish? Maybe a postcard of the sea. Yes, Goodie the fish likes water.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是加布里埃拉的村庄。这是我阿姨的商店。我能寄一张明信片吗？要寄给谁？一只金鱼。一只金鱼？这个海洋的明信片怎么样？好的，金鱼金金喜欢水。

yingyinNormal.en: You know, sister things, like I never liked how she always borrowed my bras, or she never liked how I stole her one chance to escape the village and I left her there, taking care of my mother. Things like that.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你懂的，姐妹间的小摩擦，比如我很讨厌她总是借我的胸罩，而她也很讨厌我抢了她离开小村庄的机会而把她留在那里，照顾我母亲，类似的事情。

yingyinNormal.en: My great-grandfather Ginsburg worked at a greenwich village cafe.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的曾祖父在格林威治村里的一家咖啡馆工作过。

yingyinNormal.en: You want to do this, you do this in the man village.
yingyinNormal.zh: 想做这些干脆去人类的村子好了。

yingyinNormal.en: What do you mean? I'm bringing you to the man village.
yingyinNormal.zh: 什么意思？我要把你带到人类的村子里。

yingyinNormal.en: Mine has a picture of The Village People, what does that mean?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我的茶叶出现乡巴佬的图案，那是什么意思？

yingyinNormal.en: I won't bother to explain, since every village argument is the same.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就不解释了，反正所有村子里的争论都一样。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a place where people live that is usually smaller than a town

examination_example.sentence: Ferraro analyzed satellite data showing annual forest loss from 2008 to 2012 in 7,468 forested <highlight>villages</highlight> across 15 provinces.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Ferraro分析了卫星数据，显示了2008年至2012年间，15个省的7468个森林村庄每年的森林损失。

examination_example.sentence: Rural towns and <highlight>villages</highlight> have grown and will always grow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 农村城镇和村庄已经发展并将永远发展。

examination_example.sentence: Many researchers have located hundreds of small rural <highlight>villages</highlight> and individual dwellings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 工作的研究人员找到了数百个农村小村庄和个人住宅。

word_usage.usage:
village表“村庄, 乡村”，为可数名词。
示例：She lived in our village.
她住在我们村里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 村庄；村；生活小区；居民区；小自治市；高级城郊购物中心

sense_info_list.en: a place where people live that is usually smaller than a town

examination_example.sentence: Her rich and filling-fruit pies quickly got the racers' attention, and the <highlight>village</highlight> gained some fame as a result.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她做的水果馅饼味道很浓，很快引起了参赛者的注意，结果这个村子也因此名声大噪。

examination_example.sentence: In cold and snowy Alaska, there's a <highlight>village</highlight> called Takotna.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在寒冷多雪的阿拉斯加，有一个叫塔克特纳的村庄。

examination_example.sentence: Most of the <highlight>village</highlight>'s 169 registered voters took part in the town hall meeting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 该村169名登记选民中的大多数参加了市政厅会议。

word_usage.usage:
village表“村庄, 乡村”，为可数名词。
示例：She lived in our village.
她住在我们村里。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 村庄；村；生活小区；居民区；小自治市；高级城郊购物中心

examination_example.sentence: Molai grew up in a tiny <highlight>village</highlight> in India.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Molai在印度的一个小村庄长大。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>village</highlight> lay near some wetlands which became his second home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 村子坐落在一些湿地附近，那里成了他的第二个家。

examination_example.sentence: I can, from my computer at home, pull up satellite images of Juan's <highlight>village</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我可以用家里的电脑调出Juan所在村庄的卫星图像。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_family.mean: n. 村庄；村；生活小区；居民区；小自治市；高级城郊购物中心

sense_info_list.en: a place where people live that is usually smaller than a town

examination_example.sentence: In her <highlight>village</highlight>, it was a tradition to keep girls inside their homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在她生活的村子里，把女孩关在家里是一种传统。

examination_example.sentence: Every week, David sets off across the countryside to faraway <highlight>villages</highlight> with his two donkeys.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每周，大卫都会带着他的两头驴穿越村子，前往遥远的村庄。

examination_example.sentence: Roy, a <highlight>village</highlight> boy, was trying to stand on a horse's back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 罗伊，一个村里的男孩，试图站在马背上。
